channel.title: University of Missouri (R-103)
channel.generator: Function write_rss() in R package nrcadams

item.title: Discusses licensee requests for changes to requalification program.Requests include extension of max time period of 24 months for requalification cycle to account for changes in outage schedules & reorganization of training programs.
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF INSPECTION and ENFORCEMENT (IE REGION III)

item.title: Informs that responsibility for Non-Power Reactor insp program has been transferred from NRR.All related repts, correspondence & inquires w/docket number specified should be directed to listed address.
item.author: NRC (Affiliation Not Assigned)

item.title: Forwards revised NRC Form 398,personal qualifications statement-licensee & NRC Form 396,certification of medical exam by facility licensee.Forms revised to reflect changes to 10CFR55 effective on 870526.W/o encls.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, NRC TO UTILITY, OUTGOING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF INSPECTION and ENFORCEMENT (IE REGION III)

item.title: Forwards list of missing SALP evaluation forms (0516B). Requests review of files to locate missing forms.Recognizing that RP 0516B issued in Mar 1986,request applies only to repts issued after Mar 1986.
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF INSPECTION and ENFORCEMENT (IE REGION III)
